briefdescription.para: Specifies the number format for automatically numbered endnotes.

detaileddescription.para: Not all number styles are applicable for this property. For the list of applicable number styles see the Insert Footnote or Endnote dialog box in Microsoft Word. If you select a number style that is not applicable, Microsoft Word will revert to a default value.
Not all values are applicable to endnotes. To ascertain which values are applicable see FootnoteNumberingRule.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the starting number or character for the first automatically numbered endnotes.

detaileddescription.para: This property has effect only when RestartRule is set to Continuous.

briefdescription.para: Represents the endnote numbering options for a document or section.
